name: Empty (phlp)
description:
If an adventurer descends through a dungeon, but no one is around to challenge him, does he still roll for initiative?

Use either arrow keys or WASD to move.

Made in a few hours over a few days for Minijam 98: Empty and Trijam 153: Empty World, not counting the time spent reading useful things like the Godot documentation and "How to Make Pixel Art in GIMP". Probably could use music and animations and stuff.
